name: elon

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ On ↔ Ord(c0))
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0 ∈ On ↔ Ord(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ On ↔ Ord(c0))
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0 ∈ On ↔ Ord(c0)))

comment: An ordinal number is an ordinal set. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-1994.)
